metadata.title: CVE-2021-40985 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer under-read in htmldoc before 1.9.12, allows attackersto cause a denial of service via a crafted BMP image to image_load_bmp.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
